level.text: Prosecutions for violations of this chapter shall be brought in the name of the District of Columbia by the Office of the Attorney General for the District of Columbia.

In any prosecution brought under this chapter, any person claiming an exemption from licensure, registration, or certification under this chapter shall have the burden of providing entitlement to the exemption.

level.heading: Effect of Amendments
level.text: D.C. Law 18-26, in subsec. (a), substituted "Office of the Attorney General for the District of Columbia" for "Corporation Counsel"; and, in subsec. (b), substituted "from licensure, registration, or certification" for "from licensing".

level.heading: Emergency Legislation
level.text: For temporary (90 day) amendment of section, see § 2(i) of Health Occupations Revision General Amendment Emergency Act of 2009 (D.C. Act 18-146, July 28, 2009, 56 DCR 6308).

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 6-99
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 6-99, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 3-1201.01.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 10-247
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 10-247, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 3-1201.01.
